downloadDescription: OOXML Strict Converter for Office 2010 allows you to open ISO strict documents in Office 2010.
detailsSection:
OOXML Strict Converter for Office 2010 allows you to open ISO strict documents that are created using Office 2013 in Office 2010. It will preserve the fidelity of the document.
If you make any changes and save the document, the document will be saved in Transitional format.
systemRequirementsSection:
This download works with the following programs:
Microsoft Excel 2010
Microsoft Word 2010
installInstructionSection:
1. Download the file by clicking the Download link and saving the files to your hard disk drive.
2. Double-click the ImpConv.exe program file on your hard disk drive to start the setup program.
3. Follow the instructions on the screen to complete the installation.
